unittitle_ssm: Thomas Hegeman New Utrecht, New York Justice of the Peace papers
abstract_ssm: The papers span the period 1821 to 1828 and consist of a single bound volume containing Hegeman's handwritten notes detailing his tenure as Justice of the Peace in New Utrecht.
collection_ssm: Thomas Hegeman New Utrecht, New York Justice of the Peace papers
